name: Chaotic Farming
description:
CHAOTIC FARMING, is a top-down farming simulator with a bit of CHAOS.

this top-down farming simulator / hot dog bush kind of game, is about Martin the Farmer of a multi billionaire company, that has to work and work faster and faster, specially since you need to be at the level and speed of this company.

this is an arcade game, made for the BRACKEYS GAME JAM  2021.2. with the theme: "LET THERE BE CHAOS"  and is inspired on stardew valley by Concerned Ape.

Mostly the gameplay was a inspired by stardew, and the movement and selection itself is a lot like stardew or trying to be close to stardew. 

Also has some notions of the Overcooked series, in the way we work towards delivering food. (in this case, vegetables)

The Source of the Project is available to everyone on:

https://github.com/OcelotDevelop/Chaotic_Farming

Controller.
  • this game uses the WASD or Arrow keys for movement in general.
  • the mouse position tells the selector area you will use or activate.
  • the left click is used for the actions in general, to use the box of seeds, or to plant, or to deliver the cropped good.
How to Install.
  • Download the .zip 
  • unzip it
  • Execute the Chaotic Farming.exe

Youtube Channel:

OcelotDev - YouTube
